name: Earthquake Simulator VR
description:
Virtual Earthquake Simulator made for the HTC Vive. Experience a short earthquake and fire simulation while learning functional survival techniques. Great for family learning in a fun immersive environment

Find out what it is like to experience an Earthquake and other emergency situations.

Game Detail

-Learn Important Survival Techniques
-Earthquake Simulation
-How to Construct a Emergency Preparedness Kit
-Virtual Reality
-Physics Based Simulation
-House Fire Safety Immersion

After the experience make sure to e-mail us for a free copy of a Earthquake safety checklist!
